verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:28
verses.text: And their possessions and habitations were, Beth–el and the towns thereof, and eastward Naaran, and westward Gezer, with the towns thereof; Shechem also and the towns thereof, unto Gaza and the towns thereof:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:29
verses.text: And by the borders of the children of Manasseh, Beth–shean and her towns, Taanach and her towns, Megiddo and her towns, Dor and her towns. In these dwelt the children of Joseph the son of Israel.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:30
verses.text: The sons of Asher; Imnah, and Isuah, and Ishuai, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:31
verses.text: And the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel, who is the father of Birzavith.
